mixed-citation.article-title: Phylogenetic relationships based on morphological data and taxonomy of the genus Salvadora Baird & Girard, 1853 (Reptilia, Colubridae)

tp:treatment-sec.p: The taxa in this group are defined by several synapomorphies, including preocular generally divided; fewer than 116 subcaudals, normally fewer than three supralabials in contact with the eye, maxillary teeth from 9 to 12 +3; tail length less than 29% of total length.
